name: A Few Bits Left
description:
Once Upon A Time....

Two adventurers seek out the RAM stolen from their robot comrade. Wandering outside a temple is the Memory Hog, an evil robot hoarding memory from its brethren. Seek out the Hog, and get back your robot's memory before it runs out of space!

Instructions

You control 3 adventurers. You can click on an adventurer to select it. Click anywhere to move it. With an adventerer selected, you can click on a monster to fight it. Your adventurers will automatically fight baddies nearby. Defeat the big boss to win!

Stats

Each adventurer and monster has stats such as intelligence, spirit, and power. These stats make them tough against certain opponents and weak against others. Find out which units work best in the current situation!

Special Moves

Each adventurer has a special move. You can drag from the Special Move area into the playfield to do the move. Special moves have a cooldown, and can only be executed once in a while.
